@josh225 wrote:

try doing it this way

first search for this if not then add it and under it

then

case #### case ####: case ####: case ####: case ####: case ####: c.attackLevelReq = 10; return;

and for the armour

case ####: case ####: case ####: case ####: case ####: case ####: c.defenceLevelReq = 10; return;

just change #### for the item id’s and it should work

or if you want to use names then dont just try cutting corners, Use the full name
E.g:

if(itemName.contains("bathus dagger")) { c.attackLevelReq = 10;
